data.text:
Today's the first day of summer training camp. 
Fine Motion had been looking forward to this for so long...
data.processed:
<story>Today's the first day of summer training camp. 
<story>Fine Motion had been looking forward to this for so long...

data.text:
Wow... So this is the camp! 
...Er, so this the lobby? 
Are the rooms somewhere else, then?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Wow... So this is the camp! 
<story>...Er, so this the lobby? 
<story>Are the rooms somewhere else, then?

data.text: Oh, is it!?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Oh, is it!?

data.text:
Japanese buildings really are space-efficient! 
I thought the same thing when I first saw the school dorms.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Japanese buildings really are space-efficient! 
<story>I thought the same thing when I first saw the school dorms.

data.text:
Your Highness, we've checked the rooms. All clear. 
As for the luggage...
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Your Highness, we've checked the rooms. All clear. 
<story>As for the luggage...

data.text:
I'll take it in myself. 
Can I ask you to handle the rest?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I'll take it in myself. 
<story>Can I ask you to handle the rest?

data.text:
Of course. 
If you'll excuse us, we'll be on standby.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Of course. 
<story>If you'll excuse us, we'll be on standby.

data.text:
All of Fine Motion's bodyguards stepped off to the sidelines, 
without letting her out of their sights.

choices.text: Should they stay out in the heat like that?
choices.processed: <size=39>Should they stay out in the heat like that?</size>

data.processed:
<story>All of Fine Motion's bodyguards stepped off to the sidelines, 
<story>without letting her out of their sights.

data.text:
Don't worry about them, they're professionals! 
They're all trained to work in harsh conditions.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Don't worry about them, they're professionals! 
<story>They're all trained to work in harsh conditions.

data.text: Okay! Let's hit train with everything we've got, shall we?♪
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Okay! Let's hit train with everything we've got, shall we?♪

data.text: Hoo- rah!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Hoo- rah!

data.text: Tsk! Hey, watch it!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Tsk! Hey, watch it!

data.text:
S-sorry~.... 
Eek~!
data.name: Chatting Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>S-sorry~.... 
<story>Eek~!

data.text: ...Oh, my, looks like Hurricane Shakur is inbound!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>...Oh, my, looks like Hurricane Shakur is inbound!

data.text:
Double Crown Umamusume, Air Shakur. 
Though she hasn't been putting up results after earning that 
title.
data.processed:
<story>Double Crown Umamusume, Air Shakur. 
<story>Though she hasn't been putting up results after earning that 
<story>title.

data.text:
She's a notorious data-head, so she's most likely here to collect 
some more, but...

choices.text: There must be a wall she can't get over.
choices.processed: <size=41>There must be a wall she can't get over.</size>

data.processed:
<story>She's a notorious data-head, so she's most likely here to collect 
<story>some more, but...

data.text: ...It must be really hard for her.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>...It must be really hard for her.

data.text: But it's also a bit sad that she's as thorny as Gae Bolg.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>But it's also a bit sad that she's as thorny as Gae Bolg.

data.text: ...Wait here for a little bit!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>...Wait here for a little bit!

data.text:
Your Highness!? 
She's dangerous, don't!
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Your Highness!? 
<story>She's dangerous, don't!

data.text: But Her Highness said that girl was like the deadly Gae Bolg...
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed: <story>But Her Highness said that girl was like the deadly Gae Bolg...

data.text:
Shakur! 
Let's go have a splash fight!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Shakur! 
<story>Let's go have a splash fight!

data.text:
Hell no. Don't wanna. Piss off. 
Mind your damn business.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Hell no. Don't wanna. Piss off. 
<story>Mind your damn business.

data.text:
Ehhh~ But isn't that what being young's all about~? 
I can go if you want...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Ehhh~ But isn't that what being young's all about~? 
<story>I can go if you want...

data.text: If you don't want to splash back, I'll have to do all the splashing myself.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: If you don't want to splash back, I'll have to do all the splashing myself.

data.text:
...!? 
Hang on! Let me put down my PC first!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...!? 
<story>Hang on! Let me put down my PC first!

data.text: I'll give you five seconds, okay? Fiiiive, foouuur, threeee, twooo...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: I'll give you five seconds, okay? Fiiiive, foouuur, threeee, twooo...

data.text:
Shakur's stormy attitude was no match for the unstoppable force 
that was Fine Motion.
data.processed:
<story>Shakur's stormy attitude was no match for the unstoppable force 
<story>that was Fine Motion.

data.text: ...Her Highness really enjoys stressing us out...
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed: <story>...Her Highness really enjoys stressing us out...

data.text:
Something similar happened after Her Highness first met Ms. Air 
Shakur. When she saw the report from our background check, 
she shouted quite happily...
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Something similar happened after Her Highness first met Ms. Air 
<story>Shakur. When she saw the report from our background check, 
<story>she shouted quite happily...

data.text:
She seemed quite pleased that Shakur was bright enough to 
betray what our investigation presumed――
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>She seemed quite pleased that Shakur was bright enough to 
<story>betray what our investigation presumed――

data.text:
...I lent the captain my ear for a little while, thinking ahead to the 
summer training to come.
data.processed:
<story>...I lent the captain my ear for a little while, thinking ahead to the 
<story>summer training to come.
